references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces PointNet, a groundbreaking deep learning architecture for processing point cloud data, which is foundational to the current work's encoder design.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: PointNet++, an extension of PointNet, provides a hierarchical approach to point cloud feature extraction, forming the backbone of the encoder in this paper.

references.paper_title: Skeleton Merger: An unsupervised aligned keypoint detector
references.reason: This paper proposes the Skeleton Merger method, which significantly influenced the current work's approach to keypoint detection and representation.

references.paper_title: KeypointDeformer: Unsupervised 3D keypoint discovery for shape control
references.reason: This paper introduces KeypointDeformer, a state-of-the-art unsupervised keypoint detection method for deformable objects, providing a strong baseline and comparative method.

references.paper_title: Useek: Unsupervised SE(3)-equivariant 3D keypoints for generalizable manipulation
references.reason: This paper explores SE(3)-equivariant keypoint detection, a concept directly relevant to the current work's extension to achieve SE(3) invariance.
